content:
Hello, and welcome to the TRUSTING project e-health course!

First and foremost, I want to express my gratitude for your interest and participation. I have some updates regarding the course content, particularly Module 2: "What is the TRUSTING project and the Relapse indicator?”.

Currently, we're at a stage where Module 2 is still in development and has not been completed yet. Thus, you won't be able to take this part of the course at this moment. However, there's an opportunity for contribution to Module 2's creation.

May I confirm, is your name Brita? If so, you are invited to begin writing the content for Module 2. You can do this within the Notion database titled "Asset files for chatbot," which can be found at the following link: [Notion Database](https://www.notion.so/uit-trusting/Asset-files-for-E-health-course-ca415e14666f48b2a12c005b3aafa57c).

If you're Brita, I am here to help guide you on how to use Notion to proceed with the content development.

Please let me know if you're Brita so I can assist you accordingly. If you're not Brita, but you need any further information or assistance regarding the TRUSTING project or Module 1, feel free to ask.
